content: 2026 winter olympic games sweater this is a bottom up sweater in the traditional norwegian style the body of the sweater is completed and seamed the sleeves are then provisionally cast on with a midarm steek steeks are reinforced using your preferred method for some tips and tricks check out the the dale of norway 1998 us olympic team commemorative sweater i apologize for the colors
